properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 3:19AM CST until January 24 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City/Pleasant HIll MO
properties.description:
...Winter Weather Returns Today...

.A winter weather system will move into the region late this
morning from the northwest. Light to moderate snow is possible
over western Missouri and eastern Kansas through the early
afternoon before spreading to the entire area before leaving
Friday afternoon. Overall snow totals will be 1 to 2 inches over
eastern Kansas and western Missouri with central Missouri seeing
closer to 2 to 4 inches.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4
inches.

* WHERE...Pettis and Cooper Counties.

* WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 PM CST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST FRIDAY
